aluth adahasak wuwa da me surangana kathawe hidas rashiyak lekhakayata pene.wasara 17ka e.ja.pa palanaya bida damimata aththatama mulma wedi muraya thabuwe 1993 basnahira palath sabha mathiwaranaya nowa eeta pera pawathi dakunu palath sabha mathiwaranayayi.dakunu palatha sampradayikawama e.ja.pa yata awasi sahagatha “wamata bara“pradeshayaki.e.ja.pa rajayata wiruddhawa janatha wimukthi peramunu karalla darunulesa ma pawathune da enisa ma rajaye darunu mardhanayata wadath lakwa sitiye da dakunu palathayi.rajaya kerehi janathawa wadath ma kalakiri sitiye da dakunu palatha thulaya.kese wuwada me siyalu wasidayaka sadhaka matha pawa ema mathiwaranaya shri.la.ni.pa pramukha sabhagaya jayagaththe simitha chanda gananakini.(namuth kuprakata fransiskukaranaya nam kriyawaliya ha rajaya ha wipakshaya athara bala aragalaya thiyunu wima nisa dewana mathiwaranayak pawathwimata siduwu athara eyin wipakshaya pahadili jayak labiya).
aya kudu mudalali keneku wiya .janaki nidahaswa giyada , yanne boralle sitina siya kudu pemwathiya lagataya .
ituwana, samaya sathuta ithirunu, niduk nirogi suwaya radunu...
oba heta dina aniwaryayen pasu thawenu atha

ude dharma deshanawa kiriwehera rajamaha wiharadhipathi kobawaka damminda na himiyan atawisi bomaluwedi pawathwayi.sawasa kiriwehera rajamaha wiharastha mahasena sil samithiye mal perahara kiriwehera rajamaha wiharasthanaye sita ashtapala bodhinwahanse wethata gos mal pahanpujakara bodhipuja pawathwima thalagala nyaninda himiyan wisin sidukarayi.rathri 7.00ta kiriwehera atawisi bo maluwedi atawisi buduwarun wenuwen bodhi pujawada rathri pahan aaloka pujawada pawathwe.thalawathugoda sanghamiththaramayathalawathugoda sanghamiththaramayehi poho dina aluyama 5.30 ta wisheshayen sakasu kshirapayasa atawisi buddha pujawak saha asumaha shrawika pujawak pawathwanu labana athara perawara 6.00 sita paswaru 6.00 wadasatahan pawathwe. 8.00 – 9.00 dharma deshanawa thripitakacharya mirahawaththe panynyasiri himi, 9.00 – 10.00 dharma deshanawa, daswaththe sumanasila himi, 10.00 – 11.00 bhawanawa kadawatha wimukthi dasasil maniyan, 11.00 dahawal buddha pujawa, paswaru 12.30 – 1.00 dhammachakkapawathwana suthra sajjhayanawa, 1.00 – 2.00 dharma deshanawa mirisse dhammika himi, 2.30 – 3.30 dharma deshanawa morawaka shantha himi, 3.30 – 5.00 bhawanawa kottawe sudhiira maniyan, thunsuthra deshanaya awasanaye sil pawaranayada, sawasa 6.00ta atawisi buddha pujawa saha asumaha shrawika pujawak oopanayaka nirasha dasasil maniyan pawathwanu labayi.mema pasaloswaka pohoya dinaye di dharma danaya lesa budusarana pathraya beda denuye lokumanike idampitiya mahathmiya wisini.tharuna sila samadana pinkamaperawaru 6.00 – 7.00 sil samadan karawima, anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri mahimi, 8.00 –9.00 bhawanawa - walimada pasannamanasa himi, 9.00 – 10.00 dharma deshanawa - inguruwaththe dhammagaweshi himi, 10.00 – 11.15 paropakara sangrahaya – anushasanawa ha buddha pujawa shasthrapathi panditha mahaoya anuruddha himi, 12.30 – 1.00 pirith ha theruwan guna – bangaladeshaye sangharakkhitha himi, 1.00 – 2.00 dharma sakachchawa - shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 2.00 – 3.00 gihi desuma – mahacharya patrk rathnayaka mahatha, 3.00 – 4.00 dharma deshanawa thalgamuwe sudhirananda himi, 4.15 – 5.00 dhammapadaya – galkisse somananda himi, 5.00 – 6.00 dharma deshanawa migoda sukhitha himi, 6.00 – 6.30 bodhi pujawa - shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri himi.wadihiti sila samadana pinkamaperawaru 6.00 – 7.00 sil samadan karawima saha buddha pujawa kadawatha saminda himi, 8.00 – 9.00 bhawanawa - shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri himi, 9.00- 10.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi panditha daranagama kusaladhamma nahimi, 10.00 – 11.00 abhidharma kathawa - abhidharmacharya piyadasa muthugama mahatha, 11.00 – 11.15 buddha pujawa kadigamuwe samuditha himi, migoda madhurananda himi, paswaru 12.35 – 1.00 – pirith ha theruwan guna - balangoda dhammarakkhitha himi, maharagama sujatha himi, 1.00 – 2.00 dharma sakachchawa - galkisse somananda himi, 2.00 – 3.00 dharma deshanawa shasthrapathi panditha dodanduwe sirikara na himi, 3.00 – 3.45- dharma deshanaya walpola gothama himi, 4.00 – 5.00 dharma deshanaya – oostreliyawe wiktoriya pranthaye berikhi shakyamuni sambuddha wiharadhipathi - shasthrapathi panditha digamandulle wimalananda himi, 5.00 – 6.00 dhammapadaya - shasthrapathi panditha panadure pasanna himi, 6.00 – 6.30 - bodhi pujawa shasthrapathi panditha hakmana sumanasiri himibellanwila rajamaha wiharayaperawaru 6.00 sil samadanaya ha theruwan wandanawa, 7.00 buddha pujawa pawathwe. 8.00 dharma deshanawa kathikacharya alubomulle dhammalankara himi, 10.00 bhawanawa- saranath bauddha madhyasthanadhiwasi thalawegama saddhathilaka himi, paswaru 1.00 jathaka dharma deshanawa - karagahawala chandrananda himi, 3.00 dharma sakachchawa - mahacharya bellanwila wimalarathana anu na himi, mahacharya ji.
